title: Useful Tips for 1-2 year toddlers!
content:
TIPS AND TOYS YOU CAN USE FOR 1-2 YEAR TODDLERS

- A one-year old’ pretend play is very simple.  Give them things they need for pretend play and watch them imitate others. A spoon and pot let them pretend to cook. 

- It is good to notice and praise infants for what they are learning to do. 

- Try to understand the child’s words and check to see whether you understand what she/he says.

- Always use kind words to soothe a hurt child and praise the child’s efforts.

- Use toys such as nesting and stacking objects, container and clothes clips.
